strings.drefFormPeopleAffectedDescriptionImminen: Includes all those whose lives and livelihoods are at risk as a direct result of the shock or stress.

strings.drefFormPeopleInNeedDescriptionImminent: Include all those whose physical security, basic rights, dignity, living conditions or livelihoods are threatened or have been disrupted, and whose current level of access to basic services, goods and social protection will be inadequate to re-establish normal living conditions without additional assistance
strings.drefFormPeopleInNeedDescriptionSlowSudde: People in Need (PIN) are those members whose physical security, basic rights, dignity, living conditions or livelihoods are threatened or have been disrupted, and whose current level of access to basic services, goods and social protection is inadequate to re-establish normal living conditions without additional assistance.
